title: ODi varuvAi
sahitya:
ODi varuvAi manamE Om enavE dinamum vEda sAramadilum nAdamAi adanai nI


anupallavi

  vEdam Odum pErum sAdhanai sheyyAda pEdaiyAna pOdilum mEdiniyil uyya nI


caraNam    illai enavE sholli evaraiyum odukki taLLi muruga vaLLalin uLLattai 
koLLai nI koLLavum aLLiyE avan tarum koDaiyAlun tollai aDiyODu aghalavum
